org.gbif.occurrencestore.persistence.hbase

Class HBaseStore<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.occurrencestore.persistence.hbase.HBaseStore<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the HBase table's key

    public class HBaseStore<T>
extends Object
    A convenience class that wraps an HBase table and provides typed get and put operations.

      • getRow

        public org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Result getRow(T key,
                                           String columnName)
        Returns an HBase Result object matching the given key and column name.
        Parameters:
        key - the primary key of the requested row
        columnName - the column value to return
        Returns:
        HBase Result
        Throws:
        org.gbif.api.exception.ServiceUnavailableException - if there are errors when communicating with HBase

      • getRow

        @Nullable
public org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Result getRow(T key)
        Returns an HBase Result object matching the given key.
        Parameters:
        key - the primary key of the requested row
        Returns:
        HBase Result
        Throws:
        org.gbif.api.exception.ServiceUnavailableException - if there are errors when communicating with HBase

      • checkAndPut

        public boolean checkAndPut(T key,
                  String putColumn,
                  byte[] putValue,
                  String checkColumn,
                  @Nullable
                  byte[] checkValue,
                  @Nullable
                  Long ts)
        Do an HBase checkAndPut - a put that will only be attempted if the checkColumn contains the expected checkValue.
        Parameters:
        key - the primary key of the row
        putColumn - the column where the new value will be stored
        putValue - the new value to put
        checkColumn - the column to check
        checkValue - the expected value of the checkColumn
        ts - the timestamp to write on the put (if null, the current timestamp will be used)
        Returns:
        true if condition was met and put was successful, false otherwise
        Throws:
        org.gbif.api.exception.ServiceUnavailableException - if there are errors when communicating with HBase

      • delete

        public void delete(T key,
          String... columns)
